track.strDescriptionEN: "More" is a song by American recording artist Usher taken from the deluxe edition of his Raymond v. Raymond album. It was written by Charles Hinshaw, Usher and RedOne, with the latter also producing the song. It was first released on March 16, 2010 through the US iTunes Store as the third promotional single in countdown to the album's release. Additionally it was featured as the iTunes-only bonus track on Raymond v. Raymond before later being included on the deluxe edition of the album, and his EP Versus. "More" was subsequently released as the album's third international single, following "OMG" and "DJ Got Us Fallin' in Love". The single version was remixed by RedOne and Jimmy Joker, for US release on November 19, 2010 and in the UK on December 12, 2010.
